# Mithlesh Tiwari

| successor           = Prem Shankar Prasad,
| constituency        = Baikunthpur
| birth_date          =
| birth_place         = Dumaria, Gopalganj district, India
| party               =
| spouse              = Savita Devi
| children            = 1 son, 1 daughter
| father              = Dev Narayan Tiwari
| education           = B.A. (Economics)
| source              = https://vidhansabha.bih.nic.in/pdf/member_profile/99.pdf
| relations           = Amlesh Tiwari (brother), Teacher, K. Singh Vision Classes, Boring Road, Patna
| image               =
}}
Mithlesh Tiwari is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Bihar Legislative Assembly from Baikunthpur constituency of Bihar in the 2015 Bihar Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party.
